content:
And so, the lesson came to an end,
The wisdom shared, the truth to comprehend.
The disciples sat in silence and peace,
Their minds now clear, ready for release.

The old monk stood with a smile on his face,
His teachings now etched in each student's space.
"My dear disciples, now is the time,
To focus your mind, and make your breath your prime."

"Close your eyes, and take a deep breath,
Let go of your worries, let go of your stress.
Focus all your energy, on your breath,
And let your mind and spirit rest."

"Meditate on this, with all your might,
For it's in this practice, that true wisdom takes flight."

The disciples sat in silence,
Meditating on their breath, in reverence.
The scene ends with the disciples deep in meditation, their minds and spirit at peace and in a state of harmony.
